alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Back; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 4:12PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Weber... southeastern Cache...west central Rich and west central Morgan Counties through 445 PM MDT... At 411 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 14 miles west of Woodruff to 10 miles north of Morgan. Movement was north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Huntsville, Nordic Valley, Causey Reservoir, Pineview Reservoir, Eden, Powder Mountain and Liberty. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. Get out of the bodies of water and move indoors or inside a vehicle. Remember, lightning can strike out to 10 miles from the parent thunderstorm. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Move to safe shelter now! Do not be caught on the water in a thunderstorm.

area.areaDesc: Wasatch Back; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North
